Expert Copikin: Consumers made a major contribution to the growth of the Russian economy in 2023
The Deputy Director of the Strategic Development Centre, Boris Copikin, said that Russian consumers had contributed significantly to the economic growth of the Russian Federation in 2023.
22:27, 12 February
Reuters learned about the Bank ' s MTS plans to conduct IPO on Mosbirge in spring 2024
The Bank plans to hold IPO on the Moscow Exchange in the spring of 2024.
21:48, 12 February
The United States dollar has completed the bidding process to 91.31 roubles and the yuan to 12.60 roubles
On 12 February, the American currency concluded the Moscow Exchange with an increase of 91.31 roubles, the euro rate increased by 30.35 copies, to 98.32 roubles, the Chinese yuan rose by 2.9 copies to 12.6 roubles.
21:15, 12 February
The Murmansk region ' s medics will continue to receive incentive payments
Incentive payments to health workers are up to 10,000 roubles.
20:22, 12 February
Bitkoin ' s course exceeded $49,000 and updated max since December 2021.
In the evening of 12 February, the cost of batcoin exceeded $49,000 on the Binance exchange for the first time since December 2021, when the market has been adjusted after the historic peaks.
19:30, 12 February
The Dollar will rise to 93 rubles: what to expect of the Russians
The American currency is changing actively at the price, and next week it can grow to 93 roubles.
17:26, 12 February
The Russian economy was better off than predictions.
Economists predict that GDP in Russia can grow to 4 per cent.
16:57, 12 February
Russia is increasingly investing in the south.
In Central Bank, it was reported that the yuan had become a more popular currency among the Russians than the dollar.
16:49, 12 February
" IA " : In 2024, there will be an increase in the number of attacks on RF banks ' clients through virus-based viruses.
In 2024, there will be an increase in fraudulent attacks on the clients of domestic banking organizations with the help of the Trojan viruses.
16:33, 12 February
The financier, Timoshenko, has begun to judge that banks reduce interest on deposits
Banks adjust interest on contributions, given the projected change in the key rate. This opinion was expressed by the Director of the Department of Operations at the Financial Standard of Maxim Timoshenko.
16:20, 12 February
Yamal companies earned 1.2 trillion roubles in nine months.
Yamal ' s companies continue to work in the impact rate, as indicated by their income. In the first three squares of 2023, they earned 1.24 trillion rubles.
16:09, 12 February
Putin: Inflation in Russia was 7.2 per cent in January
The President noted that consumer prices had risen in the country.
15:52, 12 February
The CB will reduce the key rate in July 2024
At the National Ratting Agency, the forecast was based on the key rate that it could begin before July 2024.
13:43, 12 February
Exporters will be exempted from fines for unsold foreign exchange earnings
In Gosmudum, the amendment rejected the proposal to return the fines for non-compliance with the duty to sell the currency on the domestic market.
13:33, 12 February
The key rate of the CB won't grow, the experts think.
In Russia, a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Russia will take place on 16 February this year on the key rate.
11:18, 12 February
The Central Bank has announced how much money in the bank accounts has the Kaliningrads
It was known what total deposits were in the accounts of the residents of Kaliningrad.
10:58, 12 February
In the Krasnodar region, 28 State programmes are being implemented this year.
Over 498 billion will be targeted. Governor Veniamin Kondratyev told me about it.
10:50, 12 February
Turkey views the Russian SWIFT analog
The Republic of Turkey intends to carefully explore the possibilities for the application of the financial communications system.
09:22, 12 February
A 16 million roubles will be sent to the reconstruction of the museum in Baltic.
The Baltic Administration will receive a grant of 16 million roubles to upgrade the Gagarin Street Museum, 22. The Government ' s directive appeared on the legal information portal.
23:53, 11 February
Experts explained how the emissions of money and securities affected inflation
The Bank of Russia is the only authority authorized to make money in the country, the process is called emissions and includes the issuance of banknotes and coins.
21:07, 11 February
